at.irian.ankor.switching

Interface Switchboard

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SwitchboardImplementor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSwitchboard, AkkaAddressBoundSwitchboard, AkkaConsistentHashingSwitchboard, DefaultSwitchboard

    public interface Switchboard
    The Switchboard is the central point for connecting shared models and handling the message sending between connected models.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAllConnections(ModelAddress sender)
      Close the connections to all currently connected receivers of the given sender.
      void closeConnection(ModelAddress sender, ModelAddress receiver)
      Close the connection to a specific receiver.
      void openConnection(ModelAddress sender, Map<String,Object> connectParameters)
      Find a receiver address by means of a RoutingLogic, establish a connection by adding a route to this receiver and inform the receiver about the "connect requestor" (i.e. the sender).
      void send(ModelAddress sender, EventMessage message)
      Send the give EventMessage to all currently connected receivers of the given sender.
      void send(ModelAddress sender, EventMessage message, ModelAddress receiver)
      Send the give EventMessage to a specific receiver.
      void start()
      Start switching and accept "open", "send" and "close" requests.
      void stop()
      Disconnect all addresses and stop switching.

    • Method Detail

      • openConnection

        void openConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                  Map<String,Object> connectParameters)
        Find a receiver address by means of a RoutingLogic, establish a connection by adding a route to this receiver and inform the receiver about the "connect requestor" (i.e. the sender).
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that request the connection
        connectParameters - criteria for the RoutingLogic to find the proper receiver

      • send

        void send(ModelAddress sender,
        EventMessage message)
        Send the give EventMessage to all currently connected receivers of the given sender.
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that sends the EventMessage
        message - an EventMessage

      • send

        void send(ModelAddress sender,
        EventMessage message,
        ModelAddress receiver)
        Send the give EventMessage to a specific receiver.
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that sends the EventMessage
        message - an EventMessage
        receiver - ModelAddress that shall receive the EventMessage

      • closeAllConnections

        void closeAllConnections(ModelAddress sender)
        Close the connections to all currently connected receivers of the given sender.
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that wants to close connections

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                   ModelAddress receiver)
        Close the connection to a specific receiver.
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that wants to close the connection
        receiver - ModelAddress that shall be informed about the closing of the connection

      • start

        void start()
        Start switching and accept "open", "send" and "close" requests. Calling one of the "open", "send", or "close" methods before starting will result in an IllegalStateException.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Disconnect all addresses and stop switching. Calling one of the "open", "send", or "close" methods after stopping will result in an IllegalStateException.
